title: Terrier in the Tinsel
description: With sales of more than 3 million books, this holiday-themed Animal Ark title will provide cozy reading for young animal lovers. While helping to set up a Santaland outside Walton Cottage Hospital, Mandy and James spot a stray Jack Russell terrier. They also befriend Charlie, a young patient, who desperately wants a dog for Christmas. Can Mandy and James bring the two together?
author: Ben M. Baglio
